page.title: 13ART AND CRAFT IN RHYMNEY
page.content: Art and crafts, in the Rhymney area appear to be thriving.With an increasing amount of leisure time available to many and an interest both in the aesthetic and financial aspects,a considerable amount of work of this kind is pursued. There is a thriving Art Society which, in 1985, is exhibiting at the Rhymney Valley Arts Festival in Ystrad Mynach.Standards are quite high with one member exhibiting recently at the Royal Acadamy. Other talents include metal engraving stained glass window desiging and engraving on slate and glass.On a smaller scale much is being done in the crafts of tapestry collage crochet and pressed flower pictures at various centres in the town.
